member.summary: Unit and integration tests for winapp2ool 's WinappDebug module Test naming convention: methodName_testState_expectedBehavior

member.summary: Initializes WinappDebug with provided commandline args

Optional Boolean specifying whether or not the halting flag should be added to the args

member.summary: Tests the commandline handling for WinappDebug to ensure success under no input conditions

member.summary: Tests the commandline handling for WinappDebug to ensure success when changing file directory or name parameters

member.summary: Tests the commandline handling for WinappDebug to ensure success when enabling autocorrect

member.summary: Toggles off all the tests except a specific one
member.param: The index of the rule to be enabled

The expected number of errors to be found on the first run
